subject: Concussions
Football
Sports Injuries
Suits and Litigation
Dementia
lead_paragraph: A group of 75 retired players alleged that teams’ mismanagement of their concussions, and the league’s willful concealment of the effects of head injuries, led to the players’ current brain damage.
snippet: A group of 75 retired players alleged that teams’ mismanagement of their concussions, and the league’s willful concealment of the effects of head injuries, led to the players’ current brain damage.
